venue.name: Windham Rail Trail - Windham Depot Entrance

item.description:
Host: Claire P. cell @ 603-247-0897
RAIN CANCELS THIS EVENT!

Weather permitting, I think it would be fun to go hiking, snowshoeing or cross country skiing on the Windham Depot Rail Trail. Please know that my intent is to enjoy the view of the area, and to chat along the way.  This event is meant more to have fun than to get a workout.  The trail is flat and straight all the way through, but is filled with beautiful views!  I thought that we would ski for about two hours, with many small breaks along the way.  If people are in the mood, we  could go out to dinner after our excursion at a close by restaurant.

We will meet at 2:00pm sharp, at the Depot Rd, Windham NH  location. Please follow these directions.  From the Nashua area, take Route 111 East into Windham.  Take a left on No. Lowell Rd, travel about two miles and take a right on Depot Rd.  You will see a blue caboose, the parking lot is on the right.  This is where the trail starts. I will have a Meetup sign. 

Please remember to bring plenty of fluids and to dress in layers for comfort.

This event is at no cost! I hope to see you there!

Please RSVP or call my cell @ 603-247-0897

 

Location: Depot Rd, Windham NH
item.how_to_find_us: I will have a meetup sign
item.why: Let's get some fresh air and have some fun!

group.name: The Portsmouth "and beyond" Nite Out Meetup Group

item.name: Hiking, snowshoeing or cross country skiing at the Windham Depot Trail
